entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or a few rain showers early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
